content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 2 the basket is constructed of 2 connected triangles the triangles corners are folded and sewn to create the pockets the triangles are made using the c2c suzette stitch to obtain a nice textured fabric this crochet double hanging basket pattern is also perfect as a plant hanger stitches used in this pattern single_crochet double_crochet skill level - easy the pattern is written using english u s terminology hooks size needed 6 0 mm / j the basket is crocheted worsted #4 weight yarn - i used knit picks - comfy worsted 4 **the pattern is worked with 2 strands held together** total amount of yarn needed - 300gr/600m/656yds ** the pattern can be worked with 1 strand using 300gr of chunky yarn finished size without the loop 21 5x7 5in 55x19cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 2 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 4 http //shrsl com/347g2
